00001 /*****************************************************************************
00002  * Project: BaBar detector at the SLAC PEP-II B-factory
00003  * Package: 
00004  *    File: $Id: BdkPdf2CBACBP.cc,v 1.1 2005/10/09 22:50:36 abi Exp $
00005  * Authors:
00006  *   R. de Sangro INFN - Frascati riccardo.desangro@slac.stanford.edu
00007  * Description:
00008  *   Class for a Crystall Bass + ARGUS pdf with it's own 
00009  *   variable definition to be used in conjunction with RooFitCore/Models.
00010  * History:
00011  *   17-Mar-2003 rid Created initial version from BdkPdfBifurArgus by Abi Soffer
00012  *
00013  * Copyright (C) 2003 INFN - LNF 
00014  *****************************************************************************/

00035 BdkPdf2CBACBP::BdkPdf2CBACBP(const char * theName,
00036                            const char * theDesc,
00037                            RooRealVar & depCBA,
00038                            RooRealVar & depCBP,
00039                            int loOrder1, int hiOrder1,
00040                            int loOrder2, int hiOrder2) {
00041   
00042   init(theName,
00043        theDesc,
00044        depCBP,
00045        depCBA);

00049 BdkPdf2CBACBP::~BdkPdf2CBACBP() {

00053 //------------------------------------------------------------
00054 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::init(const char * theName,
00055                         const char * theDesc,
00056                         RooRealVar & depCBA,
00057                         RooRealVar & depCBP,
00058                         int loOrder1, int hiOrder1,
00059                         int loOrder2, int hiOrder2) {
00060 
00061   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00062   setDependents(depCBA, depCBP);
00063 
00064   _loOrder1 = loOrder1;
00065   _hiOrder1 = hiOrder1;
00066   _loOrder2 = loOrder2;
00067   _hiOrder2 = hiOrder2;
00068 
00069   initParameters();
00070 }
00071   
00072 //------------------------------------------------------------
00073 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::setDependents(RooRealVar & depCBA, RooRealVar & depCBP) {
00074   _depCBP = &depCBP;
00075   _depCBA = &depCBA;
00076   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00077 }
00078   
00079 //------------------------------------------------------------
00080 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::initParameters() {
00081   _CBA1.init(TString(GetName()) + ".CBA1", 
00082              TString(GetTitle()) + ".CBA1", 
00083              *_depCBA);
00084 
00085   _CBA2.init(TString(GetName()) + ".CBA2", 
00086              TString(GetTitle()) + ".CBA2", 
00087              *_depCBA);
00088 
00089   _CBP1.init(TString(GetName()) + ".CBP1", 
00090             TString(GetTitle()) + ".CBP1", 
00091             *_depCBP, _loOrder1, _hiOrder1);
00092 
00093   _CBP2.init(TString(GetName()) + ".CBP2", 
00094             TString(GetTitle()) + ".CBP2", 
00095             *_depCBP, _loOrder2, _hiOrder2);
00096 
00097   _frac1 = new RooRealVar(TString(GetName()) + ".frac1", 
00098                           TString(GetTitle()) + ".CBP1", 
00099                           0.5, 0, 1);
00100 }
00101 
00102 //------------------------------------------------------------
00103 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::deleteAll() {
00104   delete _frac1;
00105   delete _prod1;
00106   delete _prod2;
00107 }
00108 
00109 //------------------------------------------------------------
00110 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::createPdf() {
00111   _prod1 = new RooProdPdf(TString(GetName()) + ".prod1", 
00112                           TString(GetTitle()) + ".prod1", 
00113                           *(_CBA1.getPdf()), 
00114                           *(_CBP1.getPdf()));
00115 
00116   _prod2 = new RooProdPdf(TString(GetName()) + ".prod2", 
00117                           TString(GetTitle()) + ".prod2", 
00118                           *(_CBA2.getPdf()), 
00119                           *(_CBP2.getPdf()));
00120 
00121   RooAddPdf * thePdf = 
00122     new RooAddPdf(TString(GetName()) + ".pdf", 
00123                   TString(GetTitle()) + ".pdf", 
00124                   *_prod1,
00125                   *_prod2,
00126                   *_frac1);
00127 
00128   setPdf(*thePdf, kTRUE);
00129   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00130 }
00131

00133 //------------------------------------------------------------
00134 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::linkCBAEndPoint() {
00135   _CBA2.linkParameters(0,0,0,0,_CBA1.argus().endPoint());
00136   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00137 }
00138 
00139 //------------------------------------------------------------
00140 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::linkCBAExp() {
00141   _CBA2.linkParameters(0,0,0,0,0,_CBA1.argus().exp());
00142   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00143 }
00144

00149 }

00205 //------------------------------------------------------------
00206 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::defaultLinksCBA() {
00207   linkCBAEndPoint();
00208   linkCBAM0();
00209   linkCBAAlpha();
00210   linkCBAEnne();
00211   linkCBASigma();
00212 }
00213 
00214 //------------------------------------------------------------
00215 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::defaultLinksCBP() {
00216   linkCBPAlpha();
00217   linkCBPEnne();
00218   linkCBPM0();
00219   linkCBPSigma();
00220 }
00221 
00222 //------------------------------------------------------------
00223 void BdkPdf2CBACBP::defaultLinks() {
00224   defaultLinksCBA();
00225   defaultLinksCBP();
00226 };
